name: Racconto Di Mafiosi
description:
Racconto Di Mafiosi or "The tale of the mafia guy" is a game about the Boss of an italian mafia that is on war with the other big mafia of the city of "Florenza" (Fictional name), that other family is the Pollos, an mafia of chickens. Your goal is to edge out the Pollos and become the supreme Mafia Boss.

Credits:

Art kit used: Retro Lines - 16x16 Platformer Assets by VEXED

Music:
   Act 1 - HOME - Resonance
   Act2 -  Gemini Drive - Nightmoves
   Act3 - VAPORWAVE Battle Theme

Sound Effects: TMK | Downloads | Sounds & Music | Sound Clips
